name: Reflection (itch) (RiverShed, OdderHyt, Rosengre3n, zexyqag)
description:
Narcissus missed Cairon's boat, contemplating his own image.
Though, twisted in the river Styx, his reflection was still the most beautiful being he had ever seen.

Help Narcissus catch up to Cairon, so he can be fared to the realm of the dead.

Controls:
WASD: Move
Space: Jump
Mouse: Aim hook
Left mouse button: Shoot hook (only shoots in the reflection)
Restart level: R

Potential for co-op where one player controls the keyboard and the other controls the mouse.

Greek font from: https://www.dafont.com/gelio.font
